channel.title: Twitter / eddsteel

item.title: eddsteel: RT @VizTopTips: THATCHER - try not to keel over and die at the sight of scousers and miners celebrating on your birthday. /via @stuartgo ...

item.title:
eddsteel: Pop quiz: In what year did Germany stop paying reparations for World War I?
Nope. Last week. http://bit.ly/akvbQd

item.title: eddsteel: I switched to an ad break on #Dave after #MadMen. Was like rounding off a michelin starred meal with a bag of monster munch.

item.title: eddsteel: Can anyone tell me a country that's not ashamed of its 'aggressive secularism' (#pope) so I can go and live there in peace?
